definition: transverse colon (anatomy)/second section of large intestine

horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: Sigmoid and transverse colon was the common site of perforation.
sentences.chinese: 穿孔部位常見於乙狀結腸和橫結腸。

sentences.english: For 15 patients with unresectable lesions, colostomy of transverse colon or sigmoid colon was performed.
sentences.chinese: 腫瘤無法切除行乙狀結腸或橫結腸造瘻15例。

sentences.english: When palpable upper abdominal mass fashion with transverse colon or differentiated pancreatic mass.
sentences.chinese: 當上腹部摸到腫塊時尚須與橫結腸或胰腺腫塊相區別。

sentences.english: Objective To modify transverse colon loop ostomy operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的改進橫結腸袢式造瘻的術式。

sentences.english: Migration of ventriculoperitoneal (VP) shunt into the transverse colon (T-colon) is a rare complication.
sentences.chinese: 腦室腹腔引流管移行至橫結腸是一個少見的併發症。
